CONTRACT_ID: They are mentioned in the text: PW-22-010 [referenceNumber-numeroReference] and R000121242 [solicitationNumber-numeroSollicitation]
type: Contract type: Shared Services Canada – Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) – Tier 2 – Service Management
short_summary: Summary: This requirement is open only to those TBIPS EN578-170432 Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region.
description: Description: Three contractual options of two years duration plus three one-year options for the provision of TBIPS Service Management services are sought. The Authority holds the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
